sorcer.core.provider

Interface Exerter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Concatenator, Context<T>, Domain, Exertion, Jobber, Model, Modeler, Modeling, Mogram, Provider, RemoteServiceShell, Rendezvous, SorcerNotifierProtocol, Spacer, StrategyContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdderDBProvider, AdderProvider, AltMogram, ArrayContext, Block, CompoundExertion, ConditionalMogram, ContextResult, ControlContext, CustomContext, DatabaseProvider, DataContext, EvaluationTask, ExertMonitor, IpcArrayProviderImpl, Job, ListContext, LoopMogram, MapContext, ModelerNetTask, ModelerObjectTask, ModelTask, MultiFiMogram, NetBlock, NetJob, NetTask, ObjectBlock, ObjectJob, ObjectTask, OptMogram, PositionalContext, ProcModel, ProviderSession, RendezvousBean, ScopeContext, ServiceCataloger, ServiceConcatenator, ServiceContext, ServiceExertion, ServiceJobber, ServiceModeler, ServiceMogram, ServiceProvider, ServiceRendezvous, ServiceShell, ServiceSpacer, ServiceTasker, SessionBeanProvider, SharedAssociativeContext, SharedIndexedContext, SignedServiceTask, SrvModel, SysCallerProvider, Task, WorkerProvider
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Exerter
    A functionality for running exertions with given parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends Mogram>
      T      		 exert(T mogram, net.jini.core.transaction.Transaction txn, Arg... entries)
      A generic service request as specified by a mogram - a generic compound service.

    • Method Detail

      • exert

        <T extends Mogram> T exert(T mogram,
                           net.jini.core.transaction.Transaction txn,
                           Arg... entries)
                    throws net.jini.core.transaction.TransactionException,
                           MogramException,
                           java.rmi.RemoteException
        A generic service request as specified by a mogram - a generic compound service. It can be carried out dynamically by any Service peer matching the exertion's Signature.
        Parameters:
        mogram - an input mogram
        txn - The transaction (if any) under which to provide service.
        Returns:
        a resulting mogram
        Throws:
        net.jini.core.transaction.TransactionException - if a transaction error occurs
        ExertionException - if an exertion invocation failed for any reason
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        MogramException
